commitBallot(address,bytes32,uint256).details: Submit a commitment for the current ballot

params.commitHash: The hash representing the voter's vote choices
params.numTokens: The number of vote tokens to use

params._startTime: The start time of the first batch

contestDetails(uint256,address).details: Get the details of the specified contest

contestSlates(uint256,address).details: Return the IDs of the slates (staked and unstaked) associated with the contest

contestStatus(uint256,address).details: Return the status of the specified contest

currentEpochNumber().details: Get the number of the current epoch.

delegateVotingRights(address).details: Set a delegate account that can vote on behalf of the voter

depositVoteTokens(uint256).details: Deposit `numToken` tokens into the Gatekeeper to use in voting Assumes that `msg.sender` has approved the Gatekeeper to spend on their behalf

params.numTokens: The number of tokens to devote to voting

didCommit(uint256,address).details: Return true if the voter has committed for the given epoch

didReveal(uint256,address).details: Return true if the voter has revealed for the given epoch

donateChallengerStakes(uint256,address,u.details: Send tokens of the rejected slates to the token capacitor.

epochStart(uint256).details: Get the start of the given epoch.

finalizeContest(uint256,address).details: Finalize contest, triggering a vote count if necessary, and update the status of the contest. If there is a single slate, it automatically wins. Otherwise, count votes. Count the first choice votes for each slate. If a slate has more than 50% of the votes, then it wins and the vote is finalized. Otherwise, wait for a runoff. If no votes are counted, finalize without a winner.

getCommitHash(uint256,address).details: Get the commit hash for a given voter and epoch. Revert if voter has not committed yet.

getFirstChoiceVotes(uint256,address,uint.details: Get the number of first-choice votes cast for the given slate and resource

getSecondChoiceVotes(uint256,address,uin.details: Get the number of second-choice votes cast for the given slate and resource

getWinningSlate(uint256,address).details: Return the ID of the winning slate for the given epoch and resource Revert if the vote has not been finalized yet.

hasPermission(uint256).details: Return true if the requestID has been approved via slate governance and has not expired

params.requestID: The ID of the request to check

isCurrentGatekeeper().details: Return true if this is the Gatekeeper currently pointed to by the ParameterStore

recommendSlate(address,uint256[],bytes).details: Create a new slate with the associated requestIds and metadata hash.

params.metadataHash: A reference to metadata about the slate
params.requestIDs: A list of request IDs to include in the slate
params.resource: The resource to submit the slate for

requestPermission(bytes).details: Request permission to perform the action described in the metadataHash

params.metadataHash: A reference to metadata about the action

revealBallot(uint256,address,address[],u.details: Reveal a given voter's choices for the current ballot and record their choices

params.salt: The salt used to generate the original commitment

slateRequests(uint256).details: Get a list of the requests associated with a slate

slateSubmissionDeadline(uint256,address).details: Return the slate submission deadline for the given resource

slateSubmissionPeriodActive(address).details: Return true if the slate submission period is active for the given resource and the current epoch.

stakeTokens(uint256).details: Stake tokens on the given slate to include it for consideration in votes. If the slate loses in a contest, the amount staked will go to the winner. If it wins, it will be returned.

withdrawStake(uint256).details: Withdraw tokens previously staked on a slate that was accepted through slate governance.

params.slateID: The slate to withdraw the stake from

withdrawVoteTokens(uint256).details: Withdraw `numTokens` vote tokens to the caller and decrease voting power

params.numTokens: The number of tokens to withdraw
